alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 10:29PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Cook, northeastern St. Louis and Lake Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1028 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Kettle Falls, to 10 miles southeast of Babbitt, to near Castle Danger, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Split Rock Lighthouse around 1040 PM CDT. Beaver Bay around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Silver Bay, Illgen City, Forest Center, Little Marais, Taconite Harbor, Sugar Loaf Cove, Tofte and Little Saganaga Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
